name: Rotating Board
description:
I made this game during the Mini Jam 101: Limit

I wanted to make a game where you just control everything with two inputs, i had some ideas like making combinations with just two inputs could give the player sense of control.

It was very dificult to adjust my game idea to the limitation, its my first game jam i do so i dont know what to thing of my game i am just happy that i could finish something.

it was fun and i learn a lot, i hope next time i do something a lot better xD.
